name: Calamity Pals
description:
Calamity Pals is a post apocalyptic player versus player LCG where your deck is your health bar. Assemble your army of cats, dogs and aliens using the 300+ cards which are all freely available to you from the start.

The game is still in alpha and is looking to grow its community. Join us today! A link to the discord server can be found inside the launcher.
